metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3657 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The virDomainListPopulate function in conf/domain_conf.c in libvirt before1.2.9 does not clean up the lock on the list of domains, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (deadlock) via a NULL valuein the second parameter in the virConnectListAllDomains API command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3657` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.7').
